QuestData.Title: Crashed Sprayer
QuestData.Description: I know that one of those plague sprayers crashed somewhere within Drak'Sotra to the west of us.$B$BWhy don't you see if you can find it. I can use the parts from the sprayer to create the device that's going to bring those things down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Specialist Cogwheel at Drak'Sotra has asked you to collect Plague Sprayer Parts.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you have the parts? Huh? Do you?
QuestData.RewardText: <The specialist steps back a bit when presented with the parts.>$B$BEw, those things are totally gross!$B$BOkay, okay, hand them over and I'll see what I can do. I probably should have had you take them to a priest first for purification.
